org.dessertj.modules

Class ModuleRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dessertj.modules.ModuleRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModuleLookup, ModuleResolver

    public final class ModuleRegistry
extends Object
implements ModuleResolver, ModuleLookup
    Maintains a map of modules found on the class-path, so that they can be accessed by module-name.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • isJavaPlattformModuleSystemAvailable

        public static boolean isJavaPlattformModuleSystemAvailable()
        Checks whether the JPMS is available. This is always true for Java 9 or later.
        Returns:
        true, if the current JDK is Java 9 or newer.

      • getModules

        public Collection<ModuleSlice> getModules()

        Returns:

        public ModuleSlice getModule(String name)
        Return a module by name.
        Specified by:
        getModule in interface ModuleLookup
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the module or null if there is no such module.
